channel.title: Alpha-server [Czar development]
channel.description:
[center]Alpha-server development[/center]
Well, it has been a while since I've worked on a server, so I decided to do another Project Czar server. This is what I have gotten so far:
-Admins cannot attack other players/Players cannot attack admins. -Admins cannot drop items. -Economy based. -Added beard graphics. -Character looks now save when you log out/disconnect. -Moderators cannot use commands for personal gain (Eg; ::master, ::pure, ::pickup, etc.) -Slayer is now calculated as a combat stat so therefore increases your combat level to a maximum of 138. -Eating food does not require a weapon. -Eating timers. -If character is idle for 3 minutes, they will be disconnected. -Added a logout delay. -Removed moreinfo; 'twas a waste of space. -Character looks now load from the actual character file. ( <3 `Rich for his help. ) -Added a boat to travel back and forth from the island of Miscellania. -Woodcutting now gives logs and the experience is now balanced. -Fletching with the emote and everything -Firemaking creates fires and does emote
I have removed the one connection per-IP because it was causing character-loading errors.
Here's some picture proof of some of the stuff here
[img]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp32/Alphaserver/Char_looks.gif?t=1227529938[/img]
[img]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp32/Alphaserver/Admin_dropping.gif?t=1227529937[/img]
[img]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp32/Alphaserver/Sharktheiving.gif?t=1228740634[/img]
[img]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp32/Alphaserver/Firemaking.gif?t=1228740773[/img]
[img]http://i37.tinypic.com/64e3uq.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp32/Alphaserver/Max_comb.png?t=1227530641[/img]
[img]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp32/Alphaserver/Shark_timer.gif?t=1227570129[/img]
[img]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp32/Alphaserver/Manta_timer.gif?t=1227570207[/img]
-Thanks to `Rich, this source can actually be completed, it wouldn't be possible without his help. <3.
Those are all the pictures I have for now, if you have suggestions, let me know
Note: GIFs were made with Camtasia studios and CamStudio

item.title: Alpha-server [Czar development]
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:11, topic:246413"][quote author=umair link=topic=322873.msg2552505#msg2552505 date=1227677593]
Well done mate, buy why have you made it so admins cant attck, i’d hate to be an admin on your server, so your telling me an admin cant pk?
[/quote]

Administrator’s are there to help, not to be spawning shit and running around in the wilderness raping people. A thing he could do is make it so Admin’s can attack others in safe mini-games, but other then that, they shouldn’t be able to.[/quote]On top of that… just make another account if you’re an admin, that way you can pk as much as you’d like… It doesn’t take that much logic to think of that idea.

Read full topic

item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

umair:

Well done mate, buy why have you made it so admins cant attck, i’d hate to be an admin on your server, so your telling me an admin cant pk?

Administrator’s are there to help, not to be spawning shit and running around in the wilderness raping people. A thing he could do is make it so Admin’s can attack others in safe mini-games, but other then that, they shouldn’t be able to.

item.title: Alpha-server [Czar development]
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[center]Alpha-server development[/center]

Well, it has been a while since I’ve worked on a server, so I decided to do another Project Czar server. This is what I have gotten so far:

-Admins cannot attack other players/Players cannot attack admins.
-Admins cannot drop items.
-Economy based.
-Added beard graphics.
-Character looks now save when you log out/disconnect.
-Moderators cannot use commands for personal gain (Eg; ::master, ::pure, ::pickup, etc.)
-Slayer is now calculated as a combat stat so therefore increases your combat level to a maximum of 138.
-Eating food does not require a weapon.
-Eating timers.
-If character is idle for 3 minutes, they will be disconnected.
-Added a logout delay.
-Removed moreinfo; 'twas a waste of space.
-Character looks now load from the actual character file. ( <3 `Rich for his help. )
-Added a boat to travel back and forth from the island of Miscellania.
-Woodcutting now gives logs and the experience is now balanced.
-Fletching with the emote and everything
-Firemaking creates fires and does emote

I have removed the one connection per-IP because it was causing character-loading errors.

Here’s some picture proof of some of the stuff here

-Thanks to `Rich, this source can actually be completed, it wouldn’t be possible without his help. <3.

Those are all the pictures I have for now, if you have suggestions, let me know

Note: GIFs were made with Camtasia studios and CamStudio

Read full topic
